entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 22 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 29 December 2022
